markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Transmutation](/Rules.aspx?ID=269)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 298 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
[Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157) spells make alterations to or transform the physical form of a creature or object. The [morph](/Traits.aspx?ID=113) and [polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127) traits appear primarily in transmutation spells.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Transmutation
